body_content.explanation: not working or reacting to changes, instructions, etc.:
examples: An attacker could cause an affected system to become non-responsive.
No selling company will survive with an inferior product, unjustifiably high prices, or a non-responsive supply chain.
He was non-responsive when court staff inquired as to his purpose for being there.
I got what I consider to be offensive, non-responsive answers.

body_content.explanation: not able to be cured or helped by a treatment:
examples: An acute, non-responsive leukemia claimed his life.
Her pain was described as excruciating, and was non-responsive to most traditional analgesic drugs.

body_content.explanation: not reacting in any way when spoken to, shaken, etc. because of being unconscious or very ill:
examples: A cardiac arrest is an unexpected collapse in an individual who is non-responsive.
The 1-month-old elephant calf became non-responsive, and staff members were unable to revive him.
